org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmanager

类 ZooKeeperSubmittedJobGraphStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmanager.ZooKeeperSubmittedJobGraphStore
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    SubmittedJobGraphStore

    public class ZooKeeperSubmittedJobGraphStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements SubmittedJobGraphStore
    SubmittedJobGraph instances for JobManagers running in HighAvailabilityMode.ZOOKEEPER.

    Each job graph creates ZNode: 

     +----O /flink/jobgraphs/<job-id> 1 [persistent]
 .
 .
 .
 +----O /flink/jobgraphs/<job-id> N [persistent]

    The root path is watched to detect concurrent modifications in corner situations where multiple instances operate concurrently. The job manager acts as a SubmittedJobGraphListener to react to such situations.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ZooKeeperSubmittedJobGraphStore

        public ZooKeeperSubmittedJobGraphStore(org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework client,
                                       java.lang.String currentJobsPath,
                                       RetrievableStateStorageHelper<SubmittedJobGraph> stateStorage,
                                       java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Submitted job graph store backed by ZooKeeper
        参数:
        client - ZooKeeper client
        currentJobsPath - ZooKeeper path for current job graphs
        stateStorage - State storage used to persist the submitted jobs
        executor - to give to the ZooKeeperStateHandleStore to run ZooKeeper callbacks
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
